actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend section 351 of title 38, United States Code, to provide specially adapted housing and equipment for veterans disabled by treatment or vocational rehabilitation.

summary.text: Authorizes specially adapted housing assistance and automobile and adaptive equipment assistance for veterans disabled by treatment or vocational rehabilitation. (Amends 38 U.S.C. 351)

titles.title: A bill to amend section 351 of title 38, United States Code, to provide specially adapted housing and equipment for veterans disabled by treatment or vocational rehabilitation.
